name: Colorado
description: A state in the Western United States known for its diverse landscapes and outdoor recreation.

content.title: Overview
content.body: Colorado is a state in the Western United States known for its diverse geography, which includes alpine mountains, arid desert lands, and vast plains. It is a popular destination for outdoor recreation, including skiing, hiking, and mountain biking. The capital and largest city is Denver.

content.title: Film History
content.body: Colorado has been a filming location for several notable productions. Some key examples include **Dumb and Dumber**, which featured locations in Aspen, and **The Hateful Eight**, which was shot near Telluride. **Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade** had scenes filmed in the Colorado Rockies. The state's diverse landscapes provide a versatile backdrop for both contemporary and historical film settings.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: Colorado is open to the public year-round and offers a range of attractions and activities for visitors. In addition to its famous national parks like Rocky Mountain National Park, Colorado is home to vibrant cities and cultural landmarks. Many film tours and hiking trails offer insights into the filming locations around the state.
